duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing a robust project plan and integrating work stream project for the overall program
Taking on project management process which includes coordinating with program workstream leaders to manage executions
Driving improvement of work stream processes and efficiency
Development and maintenance of program timeline
Revision of program plans and milestones according to prioritization
Risk based prioritization of program execution
Development and maintenance of program risk logs
Development and maintenance of program decision logs

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Engineering, Financial Management, Health Sciences and/or a relevant field
